title: Roxy Jacenko's estranged father Nick 'secretly marries' Lisa Ho
text:
Roxy Jacenko has made no secret of the fact she is estranged from her father Nick.

And on Monday, the publicist appeared to confirm their relationship is still strained when asked about reports Nick had 'secretly wed' former fashion mogul Lisa Ho.

'My invite must have been lost in the mail', she told Daily Mail Australia via email, adding that she did not attend the ceremony.

'My invite must have been lost in the mail': Roxy Jacenko (pictured) has confirmed she did not attend her estranged father Nick's recent wedding to former fashion mogul Lisa Ho

On Sunday, The Sydney Morning Herald reported that Nick and Lisa had recently tied the knot in a 'low-key ceremony'.

According to the newspaper, the couple have remained 'tight-lipped' on the details.

Nick has previously been married twice - first to Sandra O'Keefe and then to Roxy's mother Doreen Davis.

The businessman became engaged to Lisa shortly after his 38-year marriage to Doreen fell apart in 2011.

Secret nuptials? On Sunday, The Sydney Morning Herald reported that Nick and Lisa (pictured) had recently tied the knot in a 'low-key ceremony'

Lisa has also been married twice, first to fashion retailer Warwick Susskind and then to fabric merchant Philip Smouha.

Roxy's strained relationship with her father has been well documented.

In February 2018, the Sweaty Betty PR founder told Daily Mail Australia she had no intention of reconciling with Nick.

New love: Nick became engaged to Lisa (pictured) not long after his 38-year marriage to Roxy's mother Doreen Davis fell apart in 2011

Allegiance: Roxy has taken her mother's side following Doreen and Nick's bitter divorce. Pictured together on March 18, 2016 in Sydney

'How he has treated my mother after 30 years of her dedication to our family and their business endeavours coupled with the fact he hasn't even attempted to meet my son, Hunter, or enquire when I got cancer,' Roxy said at the time, explaining her reasons for no longer speaking to her father.

Roxy was diagnosed with breast cancer in July 2016, just weeks after her husband Oliver Curtis was jailed for insider trading.

The PR queen had six weeks of radiation treatment and underwent surgery to remove the cancer from her breast.

She was eventually given the all-clear but still has MRIs, mammograms and ultrasounds twice a year to monitor her health.

Blended family: Nick and Lisa have been pictured on social media with Lisa's children from her previous marriage to Philip Smouha

Roxy has previously denied claims she was involved in a violent public dispute with her estranged father in May 2016.

According to The Daily Telegraph, Nick and Lisa alleged that Roxy had verbally and physically assaulted them on the streets of Sydney.

Roxy firmly denied the allegations and a police investigation into the incident did not result in any charges.

'There is no basis for these allegations', she told Daily Mail Australia at the time.
description: Roxy Jacenko hasn't been shy to speak about the acrimonious relationship she shares with her estranged father Nick.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
